startPageTitle: Apply to register as an Authorise Corporate Service Provider (ACSP)
useThisService: Use this service to register yourself or your business as an ACSP. This is also known as an authorised agent.
forNowYouOnlyNeedToRegister: For now, you only need to register to verify people's identities for Companies House.
toRegisterYourBusiness: To register your business, you must be one of the following:
memberOfTheBodyBullet: member of the body - if you're registering an unincorporated body or corporate body
YouWillBeAble: You'll be able to add other people who work for the business to the authorised agent account once you've registered.
verifyIdentityLink: Verify your identity for Companies House.
youllNeedTo: You’ll need to sign in to or create a GOV.UK One Login to use this service.
ifYouHaventAlready: If you haven't already verified your identity, we'll ask you to do this when you start.
verifyIdentityGuidanceText: Read the guidance on verifying your identity for Companies House
toCheckWhatYouNeed: to check what you'll need to do this.
aboutBuissnessBullet: tell us about the buisness, or yourself if you're a sole trader
amlBodiesBullet: tell us which Anti-Money Laundering (AML) supervisory bodies the business is supervised by
amlMembershipNumberBullet: provide the AML membership numbers, sometimes known as your practice number of firm ID
registrationFeeBullet: pay the £XX registration fee using a credit or debit card
warningText: We'll reject your application if the AML details you provide are incorrect. Contact your supervisory body if you need to check these details.
guidanceOnApplyingLink: Read the guidance on applying to register as an authorised agent
toCheckYouHave: to check you have everything you need to apply.
saveYourAnswers: You can save your answers and resume your application later if you need to.
ifYouNeedHelpToUseThisService: if you need help to use this service.
adaptYourDeviceHeading: Adapt your device to meet your needs
readAdviceFromAbilityNetLink: Read advice from AbilityNet on how to make your device easier to use
forExampleLearnHowTo: For example, learn how to change the background colour or text size.
signInToACSPText: sign in to the authorised agent account
toAccessACSP: to access ACSP services. You'll be able to add other people who work for the business, if they need to access services for the ACSP.
guidanceForAuthorisedAgentsLink: Read the guidance on being an ACSP
toFindOutHowToUse: to find out more about what happens after you register, including your legal responsibilities.
